greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(m,n) = binomial(m!,n), m>=0, 0 <= n <= m!.
comment: This is the number of nXm arrays with each row a permutation of 1..m, and rows in lexicographically strictly increasing order.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..6, flattened
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 03 2010, following a suggestion from _R. H. Hardin_, Aug 31 2010
